name: Cyber Fight
description: Cyber Fight is an old-school pixel platformer with nice electronic music, made in the style of urban steampunk. In order to get to the next level you need to destroy all enemies. Be careful, direct confrontation with them will take your life from you. To destroy enemies, you just need to jump on their heads. Simplicity of gameplay and control (WAD) will appeal to the players of the youngest age.
